publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-532 Ms Margaret Curran: Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*, Peter Peacock*, Ross Finnie*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S2M-532 Ms Margaret Curran: Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Peter Peacock, Ross Finnie, Mrs Mary Mulligan
